description:
The Monster Hunter Wilds beta is now available, if you're a PS Plus subscriber that is. Fans of PlayStation consoles who are subscribed to Sony's service can now log in to play the highly anticipated entry to the Monster Hunter Franchise. Watch as we take on the opening 22 Minutes of Monster Hunter Wilds gameplay in the beta and fight the first monster, the Chatacabra.

#IGN #Gaming #MonsterHunterWilds
title: Monster Hunter Wilds: The First 22 Minutes of the Beta

description: Welcome to another sunny day in Nuketown. Tour Nuketown in this latest Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 trailer. Nuketown will be available in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 on November 1, 2024.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 - Official Nuketown Launch Trailer

description:
What's the matter? You look like you've seen a ghost. Watch the latest Mortal Kombat 1: Khaos Reigns teaser trailer revealing the horror icon Ghostface, from the Scream franchise, joins the fighting game roster for Early Access on November 19, 2024, with the full release on November 26, 2024. Available with Khaos Reigns Expansion, Bundle, or Kollection.

Mortal Kombat 1: Khaos Reigns expands Liu Kang’s New Era with a new story campaign and an all-new cinematic experience. Discover how Liu Kang rallies his champions and puts faith in his enemies as he battles the ruthless Titan Havik, who threatens to plunge the realms into khaos. If they fail, the New Era will be reduced to anarchy.
title: Mortal Kombat 1: Khaos Reigns - Official Ghostface Teaser Trailer

description: Vampire Hunters, the bonkers, retro-styled roguelike first-person shooter where you can wield up to a dozen guns at the exact same time, will be released on PC, PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch tomorrow (on October 30). Check out the launch trailer.
title: Vampire Hunters - Official Launch Trailer

description:
The final battle of Fairy Tail is about to begin. Watch the Fairy Tail 2 opening movie for this upcoming action RPG. Fairy Tail 2 will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), and Nintendo Switch on December 13, 2024, and on Steam on December 11, 2024.

Fairy Tail 2 features the events of the series' climax, the “Alvarez Empire Arc,” depicted as an RPG. The game also features real-time magical battles and field exploration, “Character Stories” and an original story, "Key to the Unknown."

#FairyTail #FairyTail2 #Gaming
title: Fairy Tail 2 - Official Opening Movie

description:
The Red Dead Redemption PC release is here. We've captured the first 15 minutes of Red Dead Redemption PC gameplay in 4K at Ultra settings to showcase just how much better the PC version of Red Dead Redemption gameplay looks. Join John Marston as he begins his search for Bill Williamson in this epic western adventure.

#RedDeadRedemption #Gaming #IGN
title: The First 15 Minutes of Red Dead Redemption PC Gameplay

description:
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Rita’s Rewind gets a new trailer showcasing action-packed gameplay and a release date. Watch the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Rita’s Rewind release date trailer for the reveal that this action brawler game will be available on PS4 (PlayStation 4), PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X|S, PC via Steam, and Nintendo Switch on December 10, 2024.

#IGN #Gaming #PowerRangers
title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Rita’s Rewind - Official Release Date Trailer

description:
Indiana Jones and the Great Circle is one of the funniest 2024 games! We had a chance to go hands-on with the new Indiana Jones game and Indy's physical comedy and makeshift combat make Indiana Jones and the Great Circle funnier than you'd expect.

Indiana Jones Great Circle delivers physical comedy on par with the Hitman series, and looks set to be a worthy successor to IO’s World of Assassination trilogy when it comes to creating laughs through its Indiana Jones and the Great Circle gameplay.

#IndianaJones #Gaming #Games
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle is One of 2024’s Funniest Games

description:
Check out the Red Dead Redemption PC trailer, announcing that Red Dead Redemption and Undead Nightmare are out now on PC.

Join former outlaw John Marston as he tracks down the last remaining members of the notorious Van der Linde Gang. Watch the Red Dead Redemption and Undead Nightmare launch trailer for this Western action-adventure game from Rockstar Games. Red Dead Redemption and the zombie-horror companion story Undead Nightmare are available now on PC. 

Red Dead Redemption on PC builds on the latest enhancements from the Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 4 versions with new features to bring the game to life on PC, native 4K resolution at up to 144hz on compatible hardware, monitor support for Ultrawide (21:9) and Super Ultrawide (32:9), HDR10 support, adjustable draw distances, shadow quality settings, and more.

Red Dead Redemption on PC also features full keyboard and mouse functionality, along with support for NVIDIA DLSS 3.7 and AMD FSR 3.0 upscaling technologies as well as
title: Red Dead Redemption and Undead Nightmare - Official PC Launch Trailer

description:
Rebuild humanity and survive on the mysterious planet Mira. Watch the Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition reveal trailer for this open-world action RPG. The Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition is a visually enhanced version, which includes newly added story elements and more. Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition launches on Nintendo Switch on March 20, 2025.

#Xenoblade #XenobladeChronicles #Gaming
title: Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition - Official Announcement Trailer

description:
Check out the Queer movie trailer for the upcoming film starring Daniel Craig, Drew Starkey, Lesley Manville, Jason Schwartzman, Henrique Zaga, and Omar Apollo.

1950. William Lee, an American expat in Mexico City, spends his days almost entirely alone, except for a few contacts with other members of the small American community. His encounter with Eugene Allerton, an expat former soldier, new to the city, shows him, for the first time, that it might be finally possible to establish an intimate connection with somebody.

Queer is written by Justin Kuritzkes and based on the novel by William S. Burrough.

Queer, directed by Luca Guadagnino, opens in theaters in November 2024.

#Movies #Trailer #IGN
title: Queer - Official Trailer (2024) Daniel Craig, Drew Starkey

description: After spending a few hours playing Indiana Jones and the Great Circle, it’s clear now that MachineGames's first-person romp is more of an adventure-action game than an action-adventure one, and I love it for that. Previewed by Ryan McCaffrey
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle: The Final Preview

description:
After a top-secret experiment goes wrong, a hyper-intelligent invisible raptor escapes the lab and begins wreaking havoc in the surrounding neighborhood. When the creature’s identity is uncovered, it soon becomes clear that a disgraced paleontologist—alongside his ex-girlfriend, an unhinged amusement park security guard, and a local celebrity chicken farmer—is the town’s only hope for surviving the raptor’s ravenous rampage.

The cast of director Mike Hermosa's horror-comedy includes Mike Capes, David Shackelford, Caitlin McHugh Stamos, Sandy Martin, Bobby Gilchrist, Richard Riehle, and Sean Astin. 

Well Go USA will release The Invisible Raptor in theaters and on digital on December 6, 2024.
title: The Invisible Raptor - Exclusive Trailer (2024) Mike Capes, David Shackelford, Sean Astin

description:
Enjoy the first 20 minutes of gameplay from Primal Planet, the upcoming primeval pixel-art metroidvania that blends story with survival and crafting gameplay. Fair warning that things might get weird (as you might see at the end of this video), but at least you can bring a friend in two-player co-op. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2350270/Primal_Planet/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Primal Planet: The First 20 Minutes of Gameplay
Fortnite is changing the Battle Pass again
Why Dragon Age: The Veilguard is a 9
Why someone get 24 years of PS+

description: The Lee family leave the Bay Area for a fresh start in the rural expanses of Wyoming, only to encounter hostility and xenophobia in their new community. How they confront these issues will break them - or make them stronger.
title: A Great Divide - Official Trailer (2024) Ken Jeong, Jae Suh Park, Margaret Cho

description:
CoD: Black Ops 6 features 9 unique safes for players to find, one for each mission. In this video guide, we’ll show you have to find all safes and the puzzles that may be included to unlock each one. If you need a specific mission, click on the timestamps below to go straight to where you need to go!

0:00 The Rook (Piano Puzzle)
5:30 Blood Feud
6:15 Most Wanted
7:12 Hunting Season
8:12 The Cradle
8:56 Emergence
10:16 High Rollers
11:23 Ground Control
12:14 Under the Radar
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 - All Safe Locations and Solutions

description:
There's a secret bowling easter egg and minigame in the Liberty Falls map of Call of Duty Black Ops 6's zombie mode. To get it, you need to find 5 bowling shoes hidden throughout the map. This video will show how to find all five shoes, and give some tips on how to get the best reward in the bowling minigame.

#IGN #Gaming #CallOfDuty
title: Call of Duty Black Ops 6 Zombies - How to Get the Bowling Easter Egg in Liberty Falls
